casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Anh Viet THAI. No. 7PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 23, 2007. Q. Shante Martin, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of February 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief: "Motion Allowed. Defendant (Anh Viet Thai) shall have up to and including the 2nd day of March 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of February 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
